solution_line_template: A quarter of the balls are red and therefore there are {total_balls} x ({red_fraction_numerator} / {red_fraction_denominator}) = <<{total_balls}*({red_fraction_numerator}/{red_fraction_denominator})={red_balls}>>{red_balls} red balls.
When you remove the red balls from the ball pit there are {total_balls} - {red_balls} = <<{total_balls}-{red_balls}={remaining_balls_after_red}>>{remaining_balls_after_red} remaining balls

A fifth of the remaining balls are blue, and therefore there are {remaining_balls_after_red} x ({blue_fraction_numerator} / {blue_fraction_denominator}) = <<{remaining_balls_after_red}*({blue_fraction_numerator}/{blue_fraction_denominator})={blue_balls}>>{blue_balls} blue balls.
The total of red and blue balls equals {red_balls} + {blue_balls} = <<{red_balls}+{blue_balls}={total_red_and_blue_balls}>>{total_red_and_blue_balls} balls

When you remove the red and blue balls from the total there are {total_balls} - {total_red_and_blue_balls} = <<{total_balls}-{total_red_and_blue_balls}={neither_red_nor_blue_balls}>>{neither_red_nor_blue_balls} balls that are neither red nor blue.
